statements.select:
SELECT AA.ID , AA.POST_NO , AA.ZONE_NO , AA.ADDRESS1 , AA.ADDRESS2 , AA.INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , AA.UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM jwm.Address AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN jwa.Users U1 ON AA.INS_USER = U1.ID LEFT JOIN jwa.Users U2 ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.ID WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.POST_NO LIKE #FIND_TEXT# + '%' OR AA.ZONE_NO LIKE #FIND_TEXT# + '%' OR AA.ADDRESS1 LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%' OR AA.ADDRESS2 LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%' )
AND AA.ID = #ID#
ORDER BY AA.ID
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO jwm.Address ( POST_NO, ZONE_NO, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #POST_NO#, #ZONE_NO#, #ADDRESS1#, #ADDRESS2#, GETDATE(), #INS_USER# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update: UPDATE jwm.Address SET POST_NO = #POST_NO# , ZONE_NO = #ZONE_NO# , ADDRESS1 = #ADDRESS1# , ADDRESS2 = #ADDRESS2# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE ID = #ID#
